description: The nova.utils._get_root_helper() method is used outside of the nova.utils module, so we should make it public.  This came up when reviewing the os-brick integration change: https://review.openstack.org/#/c/175569/
title: nova.utils._get_root_helper() should be public

comments.content: The nova.utils._get_root_helper() method is used outside of the nova.utils module, so we should make it public.  This came up when reviewing the os-brick integration change: https://review.openstack.org/#/c/175569/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

commit 3ef597447d01f01661828d9a9160c46fef8c039f
Author: Shuquan Huang <huang.shuquan@99cloud.net>
Date:   Thu Jul 30 09:35:44 2015 +0000

    nova.utils._get_root_helper() should be public
    
    The nova.utils._get_root_helper() method is used outside of the
    nova.utils module, so we should make it public.
    Change the method to nova.utils.get_root_helper()
    
    Change-Id: I63273aa3115502d2cd049c99b2176a7eca0d2f4c
    Closes-Bug: #1479345
